FileFormat.FormatDescription: Adobe Air, formerly codenamed Apollo, is a cross-platform runtime system developed by Adobe Systems for building desktop applications and mobile applications, programmed using Adobe Flash, ActionScript and optionally Apache Flex.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Archives New Zealand / Archives New Zealand
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
